sentences.sContent: Then, if the mix of waste is correct, the carbon and oxygen atoms involved recombine to form carbon monoxide and the hydrogen atoms link up into diatomic hydrogen molecules.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, if the mix of waste is correct, the carbon and oxygen atoms involved recombine to form carbon monoxide and the hydrogen atoms link up into diatomic hydrogen molecules.
sentences.sCn: 接下去，如果废物的组合是合适的，碳原子和氧原子会重新组合形成一氧化碳，而氢原子则结合起来形成双原子的氢分子。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + combine(组合) → 重组

words.tran: 复合，再结合；[遗] 重组
